summary:
Brussels: ☀️ Avg 30.3°C (1°C range), 2% rain (4% range)
High 35°C / Low 24°C
gpt_comment: Expect a sunny day in Brussels with an average temperature of around 30.3°C, peaking at 35°C and dipping to a low of 24°C. The chance of rain is minimal at 2%, so it's likely to stay dry. Perfect weather for exploring the city, just remember to stay hydrated, and maybe spot a few monkeys at the local zoo.
